attributes.action: Sell energy drinks to people 14+ instead of 16+
attributes.additional_details: This is due to government stopping big chains from selling energy drinks to under sixteens!
attributes.background: The governments new rule over energy drinks means people who need to stay up for multiple reason (e.g holidays, homework, jobs etc.) especially with GCSE's coming up people will need energy to stay up and revise or in the morning of the exam!

rejection.details: There's no legal age restriction on buying energy drinks, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
